languages.text: "Сегодня я вновь видел сестру. Она наслаждалась чьей-то кровью, как иные — вином. Я... тоже хочу попробовать".

traits.locale_text: "Сегодня я вновь видел сестру. Она наслаждалась чьей-то кровью, как иные вином. Я... тоже хочу попробовать".

languages.text: "I saw my sister again today. She was savouring someone's blood as one savours wine. I... want to try it, too."
languages.original_text: "Сегодня я вновь видел сестру. Она наслаждалась чьей-то кровью, как иные — вином. Я... тоже хочу попробовать".

traits.locale_text: "Today I saw my sister again. She was savouring someone's blood as one savours wine. I... want to give it a try too."
"Today I saw my sister again. She was savouring someone's blood as one savours wine. I... want to give it a try too."
"I saw my sister again today. She was savouring someone's blood as one savours wine. I... want to try it, too."
"I saw my sister again today. She was savouring someone's blood as one savours wine. I... want to try it, too."
"I saw my sister again today. She was savouring someone's blood as one savours wine. I... want to try it, too."
"I saw my sister again today. She was savouring someone's blood as one savours wine. I... want to try it, too."

languages.text: « J'ai encore vu ma sœur aujourd'hui. Elle buvait le sang d'un autre comme on dégusterait un bon cru. Je... je voudrais essayer. »
languages.original_text: "I saw my sister again today. She was savouring someone's blood as one savours wine. I... want to try it, too."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai encore vu ma sœur aujourd'hui. Elle buvait le sang d'un autre comme on dégusterait un bon cru. Je... je voudrais essayer. »

languages.text: «Hoy he vuelto a ver a mi hermana. Estaba bebiéndose la sangre de otra persona como quien bebe vino. Yo... también quiero probarla».
languages.original_text: "I saw my sister again today. She was savouring someone's blood as one savours wine. I... want to try it, too."

traits.locale_text: «Hoy he vuelto a ver a mi hermana. Estaba bebiéndose la sangre de otra persona como quien bebe vino. Yo... también quiero probarla».

languages.text: 「本日は妹と再び顔を合わせました。あの子はワインを飲むかのように誰かの血を味わっていました。私も…試してみたいです」
languages.original_text: "I saw my sister again today. She was savouring someone's blood as one savours wine. I... want to try it, too."

traits.locale_text: 「本日は妹と再び顔を合わせました。あの子はワインを飲むかのように誰かの血を味わっていました。私も…試してみたいです」

languages.text: “我今天又见到我姐姐了，她在品尝别人的鲜血，就像是在品尝美酒一样。我……我也想试试看。”
languages.original_text: "I saw my sister again today. She was savouring someone's blood as one savours wine. I... want to try it, too."

traits.locale_text: “我今天又见到我姐姐了，她在品尝别人的鲜血，就像是在品尝美酒一样。我……我也想试试看。”

languages.text: "Ich habe heute wieder meine Schwester gesehen. Sie hat Blut getrunken, wie andere Leute Wein genießen. Ich .. will das auch probieren."
languages.original_text: "I saw my sister again today. She was savouring someone's blood as one savours wine. I... want to try it, too."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe heute wieder meine Schwester gesehen. Sie hat Blut getrunken, wie andere Leute Wein genießen. Ich .. will das auch probieren."

languages.text: "Bugün yine kız kardeşimi gördüm. Şarap misali birinin kanının tadını çıkarıyordu. Ben... Ben de denemek istiyorum."
languages.original_text: "I saw my sister again today. She was savouring someone's blood as one savours wine. I... want to try it, too."
